review: I purchased Chromecast with the premis that I could cast (stream) any web tab to my TV. **WRONG!** I wanted to cast Hulu (regular) to my TV but guess what...Chromecast does not cast Hulu. Chromecast advertises that it will cast any web tab within Chrome to your tv...not correct. It will cast HuluPlus but not regular Hulu. Sure, it casts YouTube, Netflix, Crackle, etc but I already have those through Roku. So, Chromecast really does me no good.
